Seriously, this is the WORST film I have ever seen with George Clooney in it.
It has no direction, no real storyline and no decent dialog.
Watch it if you must but I think that you will be as disappointed in it as I was.
(Particularly in the ending where George dies, along with this film)

Well, I've just finished watching it and I thought it was terrific -- and Clooney was perfect in the role, along with the rest of the cast. Not all films have to have happy endings -- and this ending was the only one that would have fitted with the rest of the movie it was played brilliantly. Pity MaXiLeeCH had to reveal the ending though -- that's not nice.

BTW, quality is perfect, thank you.
Excellent movie, good portrait of a assassin on the run :)

This movie was directed by Anton Corbijn, who also made Control: The Ian Curtis movie, a bunch of video ckipos for Depeche Mode songs and even the Coldplay video "Viva La Vida", although his version was replaced by the record label. Don't expect an action-packed feature, that's just not Corbijn's style. I say: Anton keep up the good work!
